name: Kill Maya Bee
description:
Non-Commercial Use. 

For Unity education - Pismo Novska Croatia
The game was created as a parody of the cartoon Maya the Bee. Antonio Mirt is in charge of the level design, and I am in charge of the programming part of the project.

Game description:

A large beehive appears in the sky. Bees attack the player. The player is in the role of a bee killer with three different weapons.

In game:

Three types of weapons : gun, rifle and slide-action
1. Gun - bullets is unlimited.

For 15 killed enemies you unlock the rifle
2. Rifle - bullets is 40, but barrel reload 80 bullets.

For 30 killed enemies you unlock the slide-action
3. Slide-action - bullet is 60, but red barrel reload 120 bullets

White meteor - time + 1 minute
Pink meteor - time - 1 minute

Install instruction:

  • Download .exe file
  • Run As Administrator
  • Follow the instructions
  • Enjoy in game! 😁
